title: Paediatric Orthopaedic Secrets
role_in_edaitutor: High-yield paediatric orthopaedic reference covering fractures, gait, hip pathology, infections, and sports injuries.

chapters.summary: Explains developmental bone physiology and principles guiding paediatric fracture assessment and management.
Covers common paediatric upper limb trauma, reduction principles, and compartment syndrome considerations.
Provides guidance for evaluation and management of lower limb injuries in children, including red flags for serious pathology.
Summarises assessment of paediatric hip pain and key diagnoses requiring urgent management.
Describes recognition and management of musculoskeletal infections in children.
